name: BlackJack VR by Playspace
description:
Playspace gives you the best experience with Black Jack VR ,with his virtual reality glasees, With Black Jack VR you can enjoy playing cards in the casino differently, without come out of home.

Do you like poker? Do you like Black Jack? Do you like the roulette? Have you ever been on a casino?

With Black Jack VR your home will be a casino, take the glasses and look around you… you are in Las Vegas!

Think your strategy, pay attention on your rivals, hide your hand, don´t count the cards and… 21 Black Jack!

Don´t take off your glasses and feel the virtual reality of Las Vegas, Sin City never sleeps.

Thank you,
The team Playspace
